entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Coronavirus cases are spiking again, which means people are dying. Virus is getting worse for only one reason. States are listening to Trump, the stupidest person in history! People are dying so Trump can campaign for re-election! That’s real smart. What’s wrong with people!
